replies.body: How do you say leblanc? i have a friend or 2 that pronouces it le-blonk insted of le-blank.
From memory blonk is how you pronounce blanc in french.
Well I say Shaco, not Shayco. I also say Vi as in Vee because of Final Fantasy instead of Vie as in pie. Should have gotten some other nationalities to pronounce these though.
On a scale from one to even right now, I can't.
